testsuite.name: Automated tests for the omar-wms methods

testcase.name: Automated tests for the omar-wms methods Should test 200 code for getPsm default values
testcase.classname: Should test 200 code for getPsm default values

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://omar.ossim.io/omar-wms/wms/getPsm?service=WMS&version=1.3.0&request=GetMap&layers=omar:raster_entry&srs=epsg:4326&crs=epsg:4326&bbox=-180,-90,180,90&width=1024&height=512&format=image/vnd.jpeg-png&transparent=TRUE&exceptions=application/vnd.ogc.se_xml
The response we received from your web server was:
> 400: Bad Request
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: GET URL: https://omar.ossim.io/omar-wms/wms/getPsm?service=WMS&version=1.3.0&request=GetMap&layers=omar:raster_entry&srs=epsg:4326&crs=epsg:4326&bbox=-180,-90,180,90&width=1024&height=512&format=image/vnd.jpeg-png&transparent=TRUE&exceptions=application/vnd.ogc.se_xml Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/4.10.0 Chrome/80.0.3987.165 Electron/8.3.1 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate" }
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 400 - Bad Request Headers: { "server": "nginx/1.17.10", "date": "Thu, 16 Jul 2020 14:26:09 GMT", "content-type": "text/plain", "content-length": "18", "connection": "keep-alive", "strict-transport-security": "max-age=15724800; includeSubDomains" } Body: WMS server Error:
https://on.cypress.io/request
